meanings.definition: A climbing plant with dark green leaves, often found on walls or trees.
meanings.sent1: The ivy climbed up the old brick wall.
meanings.sent2: The house was covered in ivy, giving it a natural look.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the ivy as a secret pathway.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as tangled and wild as a patch of ivy.
meanings.sent5: The ivy twisted and turned, reaching for the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A dark green color resembling that of ivy leaves.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a calming shade of ivy.
meanings.sent2: The dress was a beautiful ivy green, perfect for the garden party.
meanings.sent3: The frog thought the ivy color made him blend in with the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The forest was bathed in an ivy hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The ivy shade brought a sense of tranquility to the room.
